text: Ninotchka is a 1939 American romantic comedy movie directed by Ernst Lubitsch and starring Greta Garbo, Melvyn Douglas, Ina Claire, Felix Bressart, Bela Lugosi, Gregory Gaye. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1940. It was remade as Silk Stockings in 1957. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1939 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Ernst Lubitsch Category:Movies set in Istanbul Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Moscow
title: Ninotchka
